name: Ext_R4_AuditEvent_so_site
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.AuditEvent.source.site for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AuditEvent.source.site from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AuditEvent|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Logical source location within the enterprise
element.definition: Logical source location within the healthcare enterprise network.  For example, a hospital or other provider location within a multi-entity provider group.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.source.site` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.source.site`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
